titles.title: Classified Information Protection Act of 2017
Classified Information Protection Act of 2017
To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for penalties for the unauthorized disclosure of classified information to a person not authorized to receive such information.
Classified Information Protection Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

committee.subcommittee: Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations
committee.name: House Judiciary
